column5: Has anyone used this service and your thoughts. I placed an order on dec 28 and other than the order confirmation on the same day I haven't heard boo from them.

That's strange, I've used the service in the states previously and they where very good at updating you and I think it only took a couple of days to fulfill the order. I haven't used the Barrie store option though, and it's doubtful I will due to location.
It has to be ordered through Cabelas.ca to be shipped free to a Canadian store. Cabelas.com is only for US stores
I've used it in the states and it has been great. I've also used it with Basspro when visiting the US.
I've used it many times. It's always been less than 14 days. You'd think if it was backordered they'd let you know.
always same week when i have done it
used the service with no problems.....
I just got my order from cabelas.can in less than a week. Plus free shipping to my door.
I have used it twice.  1st order I got updates, the 2nd one not so much.  I went into the store to check - turned out it was not there yet.
